card.name: Ambassador Oak
card.text: When Ambassador Oak enters the battlefield, put a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Auntie's Snitch
Ballyrush Banneret
card.text: Kithkin spells and Soldier spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Battletide Alchemist
card.text: If a source would deal damage to a player, you may prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of Clerics you control.

card.name: Bitterblossom
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and put a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Blightsoil Druid
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boldwyr Heavyweights
card.text: Trample When Boldwyr Heavyweights enters the battlefield, each opponent may search his or her library for a creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Boldwyr Intimidator
card.text: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

card.name: Borderland Behemoth
card.text: Trample Borderland Behemoth gets +4/+4 for each other Giant you control.

card.name: Bosk Banneret
card.text: Treefolk spells and Shaman spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Bramblewood Paragon
card.text: Each other Warrior creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

card.name: Brighthearth Banneret
card.text: Elemental spells and Warrior spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Reinforce 1 - {1}{R}

card.name: Burrenton Bombardier
card.text: Flying Reinforce 2 - {2}{W}

card.name: Burrenton Shield-Bearers
card.text: Whenever Burrenton Shield-Bearers attacks, target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Cenn's Tactician
card.text: {W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Soldier creature. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it can block an additional creature.

card.name: Chameleon Colossus
card.text: Changeling Protection from black {2}{G}{G}: Chameleon Colossus gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

card.name: Cloak and Dagger
Coordinated Barrage
card.text: Choose a creature type. Coordinated Barrage deals damage to target attacking or blocking creature equal to the number of permanents you control of the chosen type.

card.name: Countryside Crusher
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it into your graveyard and repeat this process. Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Countryside Crusher.

card.name: Cream of the Crop
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may look at the top X cards of your library, where X is that creature's power. If you do, put one of those cards on top of your library and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Daily Regimen
card.text: Enchant creature {1}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

card.name: Declaration of Naught
card.text: As Declaration of Naught enters the battlefield, name a card. {U}: Counter target spell with the chosen name.

card.name: Deglamer
card.text: Choose target artifact or enchantment. Its owner shuffles it into his or her library.

card.name: Dewdrop Spy
card.text: Flash Flying When Dewdrop Spy enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target player's library.

card.name: Disperse
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Distant Melody
card.text: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each permanent you control of that type.

card.name: Diviner's Wand
Door of Destinies
card.text: As Door of Destinies enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen type, put a charge counter on Door of Destinies. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1 for each charge counter on Door of Destinies.

card.name: Earthbrawn
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Reinforce 1 - {1}{G}

card.name: Earwig Squad
card.text: Prowl {2}{B} When Earwig Squad enters the battlefield, if its prowl cost was paid, search target opponent's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Everbark Shaman
card.text: {T}, Exile a Treefolk card from your graveyard: Search your library for up to two Forest cards and put them onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Fencer Clique
card.text: Flying {U}: Put Fencer Clique on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Fendeep Summoner
card.text: {T}: Up to two target Swamps each become 3/5 Treefolk Warrior creatures in addition to their other types until end of turn.

card.name: Fertilid
card.text: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches his or her library for a basic land card and puts it onto the battlefield tapped. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Festercreep
card.text: Festercreep enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Festercreep: All other creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Feudkiller's Verdict
card.text: You gain 10 life. Then if you have more life than an opponent, put a 5/5 white Giant Warrior creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Final-Sting Faerie
card.text: Flying When Final-Sting Faerie enters the battlefield, destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn.

card.name: Fire Juggler
card.text: Whenever Fire Juggler becomes blocked, clash with an opponent. If you win, Fire Juggler deals 4 damage to each creature blocking it.

card.name: Floodchaser
card.text: Floodchaser enters the battlefield with six +1/+1 counters on it. Floodchaser can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Floodchaser: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

card.name: Forfend
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn.

card.name: Frogtosser Banneret
card.text: Haste Goblin spells and Rogue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Gilt-Leaf Archdruid
card.text: Whenever you cast a Druid spell, you may draw a card. Tap seven untapped Druids you control: Gain control of all lands target player controls.

card.name: Graceful Reprieve
card.text: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Greatbow Doyen
card.text: Other Archer creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever an Archer you control deals damage to a creature, that Archer deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Grimoire Thief
card.text: Whenever Grimoire Thief becomes tapped, exile the top three cards of target opponent's library face down. You may look at cards exiled with Grimoire Thief. {U}, Sacrifice Grimoire Thief: Turn all cards exiled with Grimoire Thief face up. Counter all spells with those names.

card.name: Heritage Druid
card.text: Tap three untapped Elves you control: Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Hostile Realm
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature can't block this turn."

card.name: Hunting Triad
card.text: Put three 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature tokens onto the battlefield. Reinforce 3 - {3}{G}

card.name: Idyllic Tutor
card.text: Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Ink Dissolver
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Ink Dissolver, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Inspired Sprite
card.text: Flash Flying Whenever you cast a Wizard spell, you may untap Inspired Sprite. {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Kindled Fury
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Kinsbaile Borderguard
card.text: Kinsbaile Borderguard enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Kithkin you control. When Kinsbaile Borderguard dies, put a 1/1 white Kithkin Soldier creature token onto the battlefield for each counter on it.

card.name: Kinsbaile Cavalier
card.text: Knight creatures you control have double strike.

card.name: Kithkin Zephyrnaut
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Kithkin Zephyrnaut, you may reveal it. If you do, Kithkin Zephyrnaut gets +2/+2 and gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Knowledge Exploitation
card.text: Prowl {3}{U} Search target opponent's library for an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Latchkey Faerie
Leaf-Crowned Elder
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Leaf-Crowned Elder, you may reveal it. If you do, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Lightning Crafter
card.text: Champion a Goblin or Shaman {T}: Lightning Crafter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Luminescent Rain
card.text: Choose a creature type. You gain 2 life for each permanent you control of that type.

card.name: Lunk Errant
card.text: Whenever Lunk Errant attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Lys Alana Bowmaster
card.text: Reach Whenever you cast an Elf spell, you may have Lys Alana Bowmaster deal 2 damage to target creature with flying.

card.name: Maralen of the Mornsong
card.text: Players can't draw cards. At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player loses 3 life, searches his or her library for a card, puts it into his or her hand, then shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Meadowboon
card.text: When Meadowboon leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls. Evoke {3}{W}

card.name: Merrow Witsniper
card.text: When Merrow Witsniper enters the battlefield, target player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Mind Shatter
card.text: Target player discards X cards at random.

card.name: Mind Spring
card.text: Draw X cards.

card.name: Moonglove Changeling
card.text: Changeling {B}: Moonglove Changeling gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Morsel Theft
card.text: Prowl {1}{B} Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. If Morsel Theft's prowl cost was paid, draw a card.

card.name: Mosquito Guard
card.text: First strike Reinforce 1 - {1}{W}

card.name: Mothdust Changeling
card.text: Changeling Tap an untapped creature you control: Mothdust Changeling gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Mudbutton Clanger
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Mudbutton Clanger, you may reveal it. If you do, Mudbutton Clanger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Murmuring Bosk
card.text: As Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Treefolk card from your hand. If you don't, Murmuring Bosk enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool. Murmuring Bosk deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Mutavault
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}: Mutavault becomes a 2/2 creature with all creature types until end of turn. It's still a land.

card.name: Negate
card.text: Counter target noncreature spell.

card.name: Nevermaker
Nightshade Schemers
card.text: Flying Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Nightshade Schemers, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Noggin Whack
card.text: Prowl {1}{B} Target player reveals three cards from his or her hand. You choose two of them. That player discards those cards.

card.name: Notorious Throng
card.text: Prowl {5}{U} Put X 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the damage dealt to your opponents this turn. If Notorious Throng's prowl cost was paid, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Obsidian Battle-Axe
Offalsnout
Oona's Blackguard
card.text: Flying Each other Rogue creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.

card.name: Orchard Warden
card.text: Whenever another Treefolk creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Order of the Golden Cricket
card.text: Whenever Order of the Golden Cricket attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, it gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Pack's Disdain
card.text: Choose a creature type. Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each permanent of the chosen type you control.

card.name: Preeminent Captain
card.text: First strike Whenever Preeminent Captain attacks, you may put a Soldier creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Primal Beyond
card.text: As Primal Beyond enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Elemental card from your hand. If you don't, Primal Beyond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast an Elemental spell or activate an ability of an Elemental.

card.name: Pulling Teeth
card.text: Clash with an opponent. If you win, target player discards two cards. Otherwise, that player discards a card.

card.name: Pyroclast Consul
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Pyroclast Consul, you may reveal it. If you do, Pyroclast Consul deals 2 damage to each creature.

card.name: Rage Forger
card.text: When Rage Forger enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other Shaman creature you control. Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks, you may have that creature deal 1 damage to target player.

card.name: Reach of Branches
card.text: Put a 2/5 green Treefolk Shaman creature token onto the battlefield. Whenever a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Reach of Branches from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Recross the Paths
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Recross the Paths to its owner's hand.

card.name: Redeem the Lost
card.text: Target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Redeem the Lost to its owner's hand.

card.name: Reins of the Vinesteed
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. When enchanted creature dies, you may return Reins of the Vinesteed from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to a creature that shares a creature type with that creature.

card.name: Release the Ants
card.text: Release the Ants deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Release the Ants to its owner's hand.

card.name: Research the Deep
card.text: Draw a card. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Research the Deep to its owner's hand.

card.name: Reveillark
Revive the Fallen
card.text: Return target creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Revive the Fallen to its owner's hand.

card.name: Rhys the Exiled
card.text: Whenever Rhys the Exiled attacks, you gain 1 life for each Elf you control. {B}, Sacrifice an Elf: Regenerate Rhys the Exiled.

card.name: Rivals' Duel
card.text: Choose two target creatures that share no creature types. Those creatures fight each other.

card.name: Roar of the Crowd
card.text: Choose a creature type. Roar of the Crowd deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of permanents you control of the chosen type.

card.name: Rustic Clachan
Sage of Fables
card.text: Each other Wizard creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

card.name: Sage's Dousing
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.

card.name: Scapeshift
card.text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Scarblade Elite
card.text: {T}, Exile an Assassin card from your graveyard: Destroy target creature.

card.name: Seething Pathblazer
card.text: Sacrifice an Elemental: Seething Pathblazer gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Sensation Gorger
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Sensation Gorger, you may reveal it. If you do, each player discards his or her hand and draws four cards.

card.name: Shard Volley
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Shard Volley, sacrifice a land. Shard Volley deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Shared Animosity
card.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature that shares a creature type with it.

card.name: Shinewend
card.text: Flying Shinewend enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. {1}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Shinewend: Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Sigil Tracer
card.text: {1}{U}, Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Slithermuse
card.text: When Slithermuse leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference. Evoke {3}{U}

card.name: Spitebellows
card.text: When Spitebellows leaves the battlefield, it deals 6 damage to target creature. Evoke {1}{R}{R}

card.name: Squeaking Pie Grubfellows
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Squeaking Pie Grubfellows, you may reveal it. If you do, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Stenchskipper
card.text: Flying At the beginning of the end step, if you control no Goblins, sacrifice Stenchskipper.

card.name: Stingmoggie
card.text: Stingmoggie enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {3}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Stingmoggie: Destroy target artifact or land.

card.name: Stinkdrinker Bandit
card.text: Prowl {1}{B} Whenever a Rogue you control attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Stomping Slabs
card.text: Reveal the top seven cards of your library, then put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If a card named Stomping Slabs was revealed this way, Stomping Slabs deals 7 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Stonehewer Giant
card.text: Vigilance {1}{W}, {T}: Search your library for an Equipment card and put it onto the battlefield. Attach it to a creature you control. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Stonybrook Banneret
card.text: Islandwalk Merfolk spells and Wizard spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Stonybrook Schoolmaster
card.text: Whenever Stonybrook Schoolmaster becomes tapped, you may put a 1/1 blue Merfolk Wizard creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Stream of Unconsciousness
card.text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. If you control a Wizard, draw a card.

card.name: Sunflare Shaman
card.text: {1}{R}, {T}: Sunflare Shaman deals X damage to target creature or player and X damage to itself, where X is the number of Elemental cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Supreme Exemplar
card.text: Flying Champion an Elemental

card.name: Swell of Courage
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. Reinforce X - {X}{W}{W}

card.name: Taurean Mauler
card.text: Changeling Whenever an opponent casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Taurean Mauler.

card.name: Thieves' Fortune
card.text: Prowl {U} Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Titan's Revenge
card.text: Titan's Revenge deals X damage to target creature or player. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Titan's Revenge to its owner's hand.

card.name: Unstoppable Ash
card.text: Trample Champion a Treefolk or Warrior Whenever a creature you control becomes blocked, it gets +0/+5 until end of turn.

card.name: Vendilion Clique
card.text: Flash Flying When Vendilion Clique enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand. You may choose a nonland card from it. If you do, that player reveals the chosen card, puts it on the bottom of his or her library, then draws a card.

card.name: Vengeful Firebrand
card.text: Vengeful Firebrand has haste as long as a Warrior card is in your graveyard. {R}: Vengeful Firebrand gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Violet Pall
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. Put a 1/1 black Faerie Rogue creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.text: When Walker of the Grove leaves the battlefield, put a 4/4 green Elemental creature token onto the battlefield. Evoke {4}{G}

card.name: Wandering Graybeard
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Wandering Graybeard, you may reveal it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Warren Weirding
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature. If a Goblin is sacrificed this way, that player puts two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield, and those tokens gain haste until end of turn.

card.name: War-Spike Changeling
card.text: Changeling {R}: War-Spike Changeling gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Waterspout Weavers
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Waterspout Weavers, you may reveal it. If you do, each creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Weed-Pruner Poplar
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target creature other than Weed-Pruner Poplar gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Weight of Conscience
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack. Tap two untapped creatures you control that share a creature type: Exile enchanted creature.

card.name: Weirding Shaman
card.text: {3}{B}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Put two 1/1 black Goblin Rogue creature tokens onto the battlefield.

card.name: Winnower Patrol
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Winnower Patrol, you may reveal it. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Winnower Patrol.

card.name: Wolf-Skull Shaman
card.text: Kinship - At the beginning of your upkeep, you may look at the top card of your library. If it shares a creature type with Wolf-Skull Shaman, you may reveal it. If you do, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield.
